TopicTitle: When I launch, my rocket hovers on the pad.

Articles.Content:
In 6.4 scale Kerbin, I launched a normal spacecraft. I waited till the engines spooled up (was using realfuels) I stage the clamps. The rocket stays completly still, hanging in the exact spot where the clamps had held it.  I checked TWR, console, everything. here is my mod list:

Spoiler

So, yeah.
Can you send screenshots of the craft being stuck? I remember there being another thread on this issue a while ago, but I can't remember the details. Maybe someone else can?
It may be that the engines are not strong enough.
I have had a problem with this related to real fuels and OPT space plane parts. I would try deleting real fuels and see if that is conflicting with some part. It could just be a wing.
